description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!

title.en: The Story of Ai and Makoto: Love and Sincerity

altTitles.ja-ro: Ai to Makoto

description.en:
Ai Saotome is a high school girl from a well-to-do family. When she was kid, she was in an accident that resulted in a young boy being permanently scarred between his eyes while she emerged unscathed. Although she never knew who he was, she never forgot him.

Makoto Taiga ' a young man with a scar between his eyes, has had a rough life, but has emerged as a bancho, rough and tough bully - a thug and a brawler and about as rude as they come - all of which he blames on the incident that gave him his scar. When Ai and Makoto run into each other again, Ai feels guilt for what Makoto has become and decides to intervene and rehabilitate him. Is he a diamond in the rough, or just a bully?

NOTE: Volume count based on the bunkoban.

The Princess who is known as the Daughter of Calamity was chosen to marry into the Duke's Family to get rid of her bad luck. Her scummy husband then killed her with the help of his mistress. Instead of death, the Princess found that she had returned to her childhood. With her faithful maid, an indifferent father and an unknown youth, can the Princess change her fate in her previous life?

description.en: After growing up an orphan, Mitsuha has a healthy respect for money and a desire to live well—at least, until she dies after being pushed off a cliff. Waking up in a strange fantasy world, Mitsuha narrowly survives an encounter with a pack of wolves, then realizes she has the power to move between this world and the real one. A lesser person might embark on heroic adventures—Mitsuha instead immediately recognizes the lucrative possibilities of her new situation, and heads out to buy an arsenal of modern weapons. Her goal: to acquire 80,000 gold, and the life of leisure she’s always dreamed of! [Kodansha]
description.pt-br: Uma garota de 18 anos que perdeu sua família em um acidente, Yamano Mitsuha cai de um penhasco em um dia qualquer e é transportada para um mundo diferente com uma civilização ao nível da Europa Medieval. Mitsuha descobre que é possível ir e retornar à terra após uma luta mortal com lobos. Assim, ela decide viver em ambos os mundos. “Para ter segurança na velhice, eu vou mirar em alcançar 80.000 moedas de ouro!” “Tentarei não deixar coisas estranhas circularem para não distorcer o progresso do mundo, mas não vou me conter pelo bem da minha vida fácil e segura!” Enquanto usa três pistolas junto com palavras e ações que parecem decentes, em sua cabeça Yamano Mitsuha é uma garota esperta. Fazendo um esforço para ganhar dinheiro mesmo com um pequeno corpo que parece uma criança para os ocidentais!

altTitles.en: Qi Resurgence: Rising Of The Strongest Hero

description.en: Lü Bu, who was reincarnated into the era of spiritual energy recovery, became the hero of this world. After awakening the strongest Flying General System, he set his heart on becoming the strongest in the world and protecting his family.
description.fr: Lu Bu est réincarné dans l'ère de "Qi Resurgence" et vise à devenir le héros le plus fort du monde tout en protégeant sa famille avec un système de triche vraiment cheaté.
description.zh: 转生进入灵气复苏时代的吕布，成为这个世界的勇者。觉醒了最强飞将系统的他，一心想要成为世界最强者，保护自己的家人

description.en:
Sunghoon Lee is nothing but a victim of a changing world, a powerless man in a land infested with beasts and magic. Monsters from another world invaded earth, and they brought with them a sickness that pushes Sunghoon’s mother into an endless sleep. To pay off her medical bills, he braved a dangerous job as bait used by powerful superhumans called Awakeners to hunt monsters. But when he found himself at death’s door, the image of his past life flashes through his mind. There, he found his truth: he is the reincarnation of the Sorcerer King!

description.fr:
La planète a été envahie par des monstres, que seuls les sorciers peuvent chasser. Notre héros, simple humain, n'a pas vraiment d'autre choix que de jouer le rôle d’appât dans les chasses s’il veut un salaire décent. Mais un jour, blessé par une de ces créatures et sur le point de mourir, il se rappelle sa vie antérieure… en tant que roi des sorciers, rien que ça ! Armé de ses souvenirs et de ses nouveaux pouvoirs, sa vie devrait vite devenir intéressante.

description.ja:
10年前、次元が拗れてモンスターが溢れ出た。 同時に生まれたモンスター覚醒者たちは→モンスターを捕まえて大活躍をする。 「吉澤覚」は月に4回、お母さんの病院代を工面するために 覚醒者のハンティングを手伝って、 後処理をする危険千万の「ポーター」として活動をする。 そんな中でモンスターに大きな怪我を負ってから前世の記憶が戻ってくる… ”ん？俺死んだのか？” ”俺は前世に大魔導士のクラトゥラスだったじゃん！！” 前世の記憶を持った「吉澤覚」のパワハラ魔法が始まる！

description.ko:
10년 전, 차원이 비틀리며 몬스터가 쏟아져 나왔다.
동시에 생겨난 초능력 각성자들이 몬스터를 잡으며 대세가 되는데...

성훈은 한 달에 네 번, 어머니의 병원비를 마련하기 위해
각성자의 사냥을 돕고, 뒤처리하는 위험천만한 '짐꾼'으로 활동한다.

그러던 중 몬스터에게 큰 부상을 입고 전생을 기억하게 되는데...

"어라, 나 죽었나?"

"나 전생에 대마도사 크라투라스였잖아!!!"

전생의 기억을 가진 성훈의 갑질 마법이 시작된다!!

*********************
판타지 화제작 데카스펠 작가님의 <나는 마도왕이다> 본격 웹툰화!
세계를 휩쓰는 마도왕의 마법을 웹툰으로 만나 보세요!

description.ru:
10 лет назад орда монстров из разлома в пространстве и времени начала атаковать человечество. В то же время люди начали пробуждать силу и охотиться на монстров за славой и деньгами. Санхун, нуждающийся в деньгах из-за болезни своей матери, берёт опасную работу, помогая охотиться на этих монстров четыре раза в месяц в качестве приманки. Но однажды, оказавшись тяжело раненным, он вспомнит свою прошлую жизнь.  
«Я что, только что умер? Погоди-ка, я был королём-волшебником Кратра в прошлой жизни?!»

description.pt-br:
10 anos atrás, a horda de monstros da fenda formada da distorção do tempo e espaço iniciaram um ataque contra a humanidade. Ao mesmo tempo que, as pessoas começaram a despertar poderes e iniciaram uma caçada aos monstros em busca de fama e dinheiro. Lee SungHoon, à procura de dinheiro devido à doença de sua mãe, arruma um trabalho altamente perigoso, ajudando na caçada desses monstros bancando a isca para os caçadores, fazendo isso quatro vezes no mês. Mas, um dia, ele é gravemente ferido por um monstro e relembra de sua vida passada como o Rei dos Feiticeiros. "Hã? Eu acabei de morrer? Espera aí, eu era O Rei dos Feiticeiros Kuratauras na minha vida passada?" Com as memórias de sua vida anterior, o espetáculo do poder mágico esmagador de SungHoon se inicia.

description.en:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

title.en: First call 1〜 The Virgin Surgeon is About to be Married to a Young Yakuza!〜

altTitles.ja: ファーストコール 1 ～童貞外科医、年下ヤクザの嫁にされそうです！～

description.en:
“I love you, doctor. Please become my wife.”

Takara Souta, a young and revered orthopedic surgeon, is brought in to work on a handsome man with a pierced penis—
The man turned out to be Ibu Seiichirou, the young leader of the Ibu clan and the largest crime syndicate in the Kanto region!
Ibu, who has fallen in love with Souta, the man who saved him, suddenly kisses and proposes to him, asking him, “to be his miss”!
 
A story too sweet to exist!
 The dangerous love comedy between a yakuza leader and a (virgin) orthopedic surgeon is finally comicalized!
 Includes a newly drawn manga, "Sudden Herpangina".

title.en: My Husband Who Hates Me Has Lost His Memories

altTitles.en: My Husband Hates Me, But He Lost His Memories
My Resentful Husband Lost His Memories

description.en: In a politically arranged marriage devoid of love, Lily is wed to Theodore, the head of a rival family. Theodore loathes the union, but little does he know that Lily despises her own family as much as he does. Living a quiet life, she counts the days until their inevitable divorce. Then fate intervenes—a sudden accident erases Theodore’s memories of her, transforming his coldness into unexpected affection. Can Lily trust this dramatic shift, or must she guard her heart to avoid future heartbreak?

title.en: A Quirky Girl Is Inviting Me to Bed

altTitles.ja: クセ強彼女は床にいざなう

description.en:
***I'm suddenly living together with the older girl I used to have a crush on!? Even more, I'm starting to suspect that she's a slut!?***

Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on.

The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?

This is the start of his exciting new life surrounded by slutty(?) older girls!
description.ja:
昔好きだったお姉さんといきなり同棲!?しかもヤリマ●疑惑が浮上!?

一浪して大学に合格した青年・木吉直人。上京のために住める場所を探していたところ、親戚で憧れの姉・月（ルナ）の家で同棲することに。
昔憧れていた月は垢ぬけて、美しく成長し…そして…ビッチになっていた!?夜な夜なあられもない嬌声を聞き、モンモンとする直人。
他の男性がいる割に距離感もめちゃくちゃ近い。何を考えているか分からない月に翻弄され、さらに月以外の
エッチで癖が強い女の子たちも集まりだし…!?

ビッチ？なお姉さんたちに囲まれる楽しい新生活、開幕ーー。

title.en: Guide to Raising a Loyal Dog

description.en: A reward notice for a “lost dog” ties the fates of Ling Xiangwan and Bai Qingxiao together. As the poor university student, Ling Xiangwan, searches for the owner of the dog he is currently carrying, he accidentally catches glimpses of Bai Qingxiao’s naughty deeds. It is only then that he realizes this is not the kind of “dog” the notice was looking for. As the door to flee the scene is quite literally shut, Bai Qingxiao asks Ling Xiangwan to pay him company, how humiliating! Ling Xiangwan leaves, fuming. After that, Bai Qingxiao just can’t seem to get Ling Xiangwan out of his mind…

title.en: HUNTER x HUNTER - DIGITAL COLORED COMICS

altTitles.en: Hunter x Hunter - Digital Colored Comics

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do famoso mangá "Hunter x Hunter". Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.

altTitles.ja-ro: RokuBuru
Rokudenashi Blues

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.vi:
Maeda Taison, chàng thiếu niên tới từ Osaka mang trong mình ước mơ trở thành nhà vô địch boxing thế giới. Xuyên suốt 3 năm học của cậu không chỉ là những trận đánh, những xung đột mà còn có cả những câu chuyện đầy tính nhân văn.
Huyền thoại của dòng manga yankee Nhật Bản, dù đã kết thúc từ năm 1997 nhưng Rokudenashi Blues (RB) vẫn đang là bộ manga yankee bán chạy nhất mọi thời đại. Vì kết thúc đã lâu nên nội dung của nó có phần "outdate", tuy nhiên vẫn rất đáng đọc.

Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

description.en: Once a prince of a fallen nation, but due to the defeat in war, he could only be reduced as a prisoner and become plaything for the powerful people of the victorious nation. Xing Mu, who endured the humiliation and disguised himself as an Omega, was on a mission of revenge and restoration of his homeland. However, his biggest obstacle was the helpless second prince of the enemy nation — a beautiful omega who was marked by him in an accident. Therefore, the love and hate between the two, accompanied by the dark surge of revenge, tightly entangled together...
description.pl: Kiedyś należał do rodziny królewskiej, lecz jego kraj poniósł solidną porażkę. Mógł tylko zostać jeńcem dla potężnych ludzi zwycięskiego kraju, aby mogli się zabawić jego kosztem. Xing Mu, mimo iż czuł upokorzenie, przebrał się za Omegę, by móc się zemścić i odbudować swój kraj. Jednakże... Najważniejszą przeszkodą, jaką musiał pokonać, był drugi książę wroga, Hill, którego przez przypadek oznaczył, czyniąc z niego jego Omegę. W tym momencie miłość i nienawiść między dwojgiem ludzi są ściśle splecione z nurtem zemsty....

description.en:
High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women.

Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again.

However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five! A brain-shaking, romantic comedy suspense begins!

description.de:
Seirin führt bereits ihr drittes Leben. All ihre Leben verbrachte sie als Jungfrau, was sie aber nicht davon abhielt, einen erotischen Roman über den Dämonenkönig zu schreiben. Dem Dämonenkönig gefiel das gar nicht und er schwor auf sein Juwel, daß alle inhaftiert werden sollen, die das Buch gelesen haben. Es stellte sich aber heraus, daß Buch ein Bestseller ist. Nun müssen der Dämonenkönig und Seirin die Hälfte des Buchs nachstellen, um den Schwur zu umgehen und eine Masseninhalftierung der Bevölkerung zu verhindern.

description.en:
A writer wrote steamy adult stories starring a Demon King. Now he wants justice! In order to avoid execution, the writer must make half of the contents of her novel, a collection of lust and desire, come true! But wait, she is supposed to re-enact all the scenes, as the female lead, while the Demon King acts out the male lead? Living in a world of demons, caught by its monarch, and engaged in steamy role play! Let the games begin!

---
I hit it big with an erotica novel starring the demon lord, but then got sued by the real demon lord! I need to turn at least half the novel into reality to survive. The smut novel *Sungwoon Lim’s 5,500 Shadows* needs to become reality!

Irene Yoo, whose life ended just as it began to bloom at nineteen, spent her second life as a virgin ghost full of yin* energy in the underworld. She made the most of her benefits after turning into a succubus and granted permission to live in the Demon World.

‘I was going to teach that innocent, workaholic Demon Lord these kind of things, that kind of things, and also those things, but-'

“That’s not much. Close your eyes. Let’s finish quickly.”

“I… I have my preferences too!”

“I think I know your preferences better than you do.”

The Demon Lord memorized the erotica I wrote in one night. Furthermore, what is with this pervy ‘progress chart’?!

When I told him that I can’t lose my virginity to someone I don’t have feelings for, the Demon Lord, Claude Stern, asked as he undid the buttons of his shirt, “You don’t have any feelings for me?”

Your Majesty, why are you deepening your voice? Why are you closing the distance between us?!

---

description.fr:
Sirine Pollux vit sa troisième vie. C'est sa première année dans le royaume du diable. Elle écrit des romans affriolants dans lesquels elle déverse ses fantasmes, mettant en scène le roi. Celui-ci menace de bannir le livre pour diffamation. Pour empêcher cela, Sirine doit emménager au palais contre son gré pour reproduire certaines scènes intimes de son livre avec le roi, qui semble prendre un malin plaisir à la manipuler. La frontière entre le jeu et les sentiments s'effrite doucement et la reine, malheureuse dans ce royaume et grande admiratrice du travail de Sirine, met tout en œuvre pour inciter les deux protagonistes à se rapprocher. Dans ce monde magique où ténèbres et lumière se mêlent et ou le temps ne semble pas avoir d'emprise, qui de Sirine ou du roi mène réellement la danse?

Aku sukses besar dengan novel erotika yang dibintangi oleh raja iblis, tapi kemudian dituntut oleh raja iblis yang sebenarnya! Saya perlu mengubah setidaknya setengah novel menjadi kenyataan untuk bertahan hidup. Novel cabul <Sungwoon Lim's 5,500 Shadows> perlu menjadi kenyataan! Irene Yoo, yang hidupnya berakhir tepat saat mulai mekar di usia sembilan belas, menghabiskan kehidupan keduanya sebagai hantu perawan yang penuh energi yin * di dunia bawah. Dia memanfaatkan keuntungannya setelah berubah menjadi succubus dan diberikan izin untuk tinggal di Dunia Iblis. 'Aku akan mengajari Raja Iblis yang tidak bersalah dan gila kerja hal-hal semacam ini, hal-hal semacam itu, dan juga hal-hal itu, tapi-'

description.ko:
마왕을 남주로 야설 써서 대박 쳤다가, 진짜 마왕에게 고소당했다!

꽃다운 열아홉에 인생을 마감한 유이린,
저승에서 음기충만 처녀귀신으로 인생 2회 차 보내고
'음란마귀' 자격으로 마계 영주권 받은 전력을 살려마왕을 남주로 야설 써서 대박 쳤다가,
진짜 마왕에게 고소당했다!
살아남으려면 문제의 소설 절반을 현실로 만들어야 한단다.
그러니까, 욕망 가득한 <임성운의 5,500가지 그림자>를!

'그것도, 내가 여자주인공, 재수 부재중인 마왕님이 남자주인공 역할을 연기해서?

그런데.

"별거 없더군. 눈 감아. 최대한 빨리 끝내지."
마왕, 클라우드 슈테른이 셔츠 단추를 풀며 물었다.
"내가 마음에도 없나?"
목소리는 왜 깔아요, 전하. 거리는 왜 좁히시고!

description.en:
“If you press this button, you can enter the world of your own special drama. 
(It will be revealed when you finish the story. If you don’t finish the story, you’ll never know.)

This was posted on my SNS timeline.
It seemed fun, but it was a problem since I had to study for exams.
I quickly pressed it to share with my friend and then fell asleep.

…….I should have just fallen into a deep sleep.

“Cheep.”

What.

“Squawk!”

What the hell! Where am I?

description.en: Rising Sun will revolve around Tsubasa as he aims to participate in the Olympics as a representative from Japan.

Iori, a highschool student, fantasizes about being held by handsome men. His stepbrother, Ayato, has a face that's just his type. 

Though he spends his days masturbating with his stepbrother in mind, he tries to stay away from Ayato, as he becomes overcome with lust whenever he smells Ayato's scent, or sees his cold gaze.

Just when Iori is trying to prevent himself from getting carried away, thinking "I have to stop this," he discovers Ayato, who has brought a guy into his room...

A forbidden love story about a highschool student whose brother is divinely handsome. The start of an obsessive love story between two step brothers, from the mangaka Okita Yuuho!

description.en:
Eighth story arc of JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken series.  
  
Following the Great East Japan earthquake, Morioh has been stricken by vast earthen protrusions known by the locals as Wall Eyes. Despite investigation, professional estimations are left empty. Meanwhile, the young girl Yasuho Hirose discovers a man buried within the ground, he possesses a distinctive star-shaped birthmark together with deeply penetrating bite marks. The man, who has contracted a staple case of amnesia is taken in by a local family and given the name Jousuke Higashikata, however mysterious events cannot stop from piling one upon the other and soon that enigma known as stand emerges to complement the great cloud of confusion.  
  
- Won the Grand Prize in the manga category at the 17th Japan Media Arts Festival in 2013.
description.hu:
A Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken sorozat nyolcadik történetíve.

A nagy japán földrengést követően Morioh-t hatalmas földkiugrások sújtották, ahogy helyiek nevezik, Szemes falak. A vizsgálat ellenére a szakmai becslések üresen maradtak. Eközben egy fiatal lány, Yasuho Hirose egy férfit talál a földbe temetve,aki jellegzetes csillagalakú anyajeggyel és mélyre hatoló harapásnyomokkal rendelkezik. A férfit, aki az aminézia jeleit mutatja, egy helyi család hozta ide és adta neki a Josuke Higashikata nevet, azonban a különös események nem maradnak abba, egyik a másikat halmozza leginkább és hamarosan a standként ismert talány előbukkan, hogy eloszlassa a zavarságok felhőit. 

- 2013-ban a 17-dik Japan Media Arts Festivalon megnyerte a fődíjat a manga kategóriában.

altTitles.en: I Will Become the Hero's Mother
I Became the Mother of the Warrior

description.en:
"You may be my wife but, I won't lay a single finger on you."

"Really? Then can I touch you?"

"...What?"

About 20 years later, the world will be in ruins because of the invasion of the beasts. There's only one way to stop the destruction. To marry the duke who is called a monster, and have his child who will become the hero in the future!

Elena who saw a glimpse of the future succeeded in marrying him but...

"Are we going to continue to not do anything?"

I wanted to get it quickly out of the way, but my husband's impregnable fortress is stronger than I could have imagined!

"Take it off! Why aren't you taking it off?! Are your clothes part of your skin?"

Will Elena be able to safely give birth to the hero and save the world?

The tower that symbolizes the pearl of the end times,

the monstrous monsters outside the tower that are attracted by evil thoughts,

the gambling of the superiors, 

the perils of the explorers, 

the traps in the end times, 

the moment the white mist wakes up, 

the game begins.
description.zh: 象征末世明珠的高塔，被恶念吸引的塔外畸变怪物，上位者的赌局，探索者的险境，末日中的陷阱，在白雾醒来的那一刻，游戏开始了。

altTitles.es-la: El Reinicio Como Sanador ~La Magia de Muerte Instantánea Con La Habilidad de Copiar La Curación Trascendental~

altTitles.ja-ro: Kaifuku Jutsushi Yarinaoshi: Sokushi Mahou to Skill Copy no Chouetsu Heal

altTitles.ja: 回復術士のやり直し～即死魔法とスキルコピーの超越ヒール～

description.de: Keyaru wurde durch sein Unwissen immer und immer wieder ausgenutzt. Aber eines Tages erkannte er die wahre Macht der Heilmagie und kam zu der Überzeugung, dass ein Heiler die stärkste Klasse sei. Wie auch immer, ehe ihm das Potential eines Heilers klar wurde, war er bereits allem beraubt worden. Daher wandte er seine Heilmagie auf die Welt selbst an und reiste so 4 Jahre in der Zeit zurück. Er würde sich für alles rächen, was man ihm angetan hatte. Dies ist die kranke heldenhafte Geschichte eines Heilers, der der stärkste wurde, indem er sein Wissen über Heilung und seine Erfahrungen aus seinem vorherigen Leben kombiniert.
description.en:
"Healing magicians cannot fight alone."   
Keyaru, who was bound by this common knowledge, was exploited again and again by others.  
But one day, he noticed what lay beyond healing magic, and was convinced that a healing magician was the strongest class. However, by the time he realized that potential, he was deprived of everything. Thus, he used healing magic on the world itself to go back four years, deciding to redo everything.  
This is a heroic tale of one healing magician who became the strongest by using knowledge from his past life and healing magic.
description.it:
"I maghi curatori non possono combattere da soli." Keyaru, che era legato a questa conoscenza comune, fu sfruttato più e più volte dagli altri.  
Ma un giorno notò cosa c'era oltre la guarigione della magia e si convinse che il mago guaritore fosse la classe più forte. Tuttavia, quando ne realizzò il potenziale, fu privato di tutto. Così, usando la magia curativa sul mondo stesso, è tornato indietro di quattro anni, determinato a ricominciare tutto da capo.
description.pl:
"Uzdrowiciele nie mogą walczyć w pojedynkę."  
Keare, który wiedział o tym aż za dobrze, był raz po raz wykorzystywany przez innych.  
Ale pewnego dnia odkrywa coś, co kryje się poza magią uzdrowienia, i zyskuje pewność, że uzdrowiciel to najpotężniejsza z klas maga. Jednakże zanim zdał sobie sprawę z jej potencjału, został już pozbawiony wszystkiego, co miał. Dlatego właśnie użył magii uzdrowienia na samym świecie, by cofnąć się w czasie o cztery lata, postanawiając, że zacznie wszystko od nowa.  
Oto heroiczna opowieść o pewnym uzdrowicielu, który stał się najsilniejszym dzięki wykorzystaniu wiedzy z dawnego życia i magii uzdrawiania.
description.pt-br:
"Magos de cura não podem lutar sozinhos." 

Keare, que estava vinculado por esse conhecimento comum, foi explorado uma vez ou outra pelos outros. Mas um dia, ele notou o que estava além da magia de cura e estava convencido de que um mago de cura era a classe mais forte. No entanto, quando percebeu esse potencial, ele estava privado de tudo. Assim, ele usou a magia de cura no próprio mundo para voltar quatro anos, decidindo refazer tudo. Este é um conto heroico de um mago de cura que se tornou o mais forte usando o conhecimento de sua vida passada e magia de cura.

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

Regarding Reincarnated to Slime: Satoru x Ciel Fan Manga

description.en:
**Web Novel Spoilers Warning: The story takes place on Earth after end of the Web Novel.**

---

Rimuru plants a parallel existance inside Satoru Mikami, to live his life with Ciel and finish his missions he was unable to when he first died.

Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!

description.en:
In a past life, the mountain deity took in a quiet child, only to find her care fostering an unexpected twist: the little one didn't want to be a servant but instead aspired to be the deity's most intimate companion! But fate played its cruel hand, turning the once inseparable pair into bitter enemies.

In this life, an adorable, water-fearing mermaid happens upon an aloof beauty with no memories of her past. A chance kiss during their first meeting sets off a chaotic companionship. However, what seemed to be a serendipitous meeting turns out to be a reunion of a relationship already rich with deep-seated emotions...

From lifetimes past to the present, love flourishes...

Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

altTitles.ja: とある暗部の少女共棲

altTitles.ja-ro: Toaru Anbu no Shoujo Kyousei

description.en:
In Academy City, where esper abilities have been recognized as a general science. Behind the peace, there is a dark side organization that undertakes missions that cannot be made public.

"Item" is an elite unit consisting of four girls. Takitsubo Rikou is able to read and track the weak power emitted by those with abilities. Frenda Seivelun, who excels in combat using explosives and traps. Kinuhata Saiai, who can manipulate nitrogen at will and plays a defensive role. And one of the 7 espers that Academy City is proud of: Mugino Shizuri. They live freely in the darkness of the Academy City, and quietly set their sights on their target...!

This is a story of encounter, friendship, and darkness that eventually leads to a 'terrible incident'!

title.en: Charming the Duke of the North

altTitles.fr: Je vais séduire le Duc du Nord

altTitles.ja: 北部公爵を誘惑します

altTitles.vi: Kế hoạch là quyến rũ công tước phương bắc

description.en:
"Pretend to be my lover and join the social circle."

Selena, the top star that had the entire world's attention, was suddenly warped to Northern Duke's land during an accident while filming. Kalcion, the Northern Duke that saved her from the infernal beasts, offers Selena a chance to go back home in return for collecting information in various social circles by pretending to be his lover. Selena quickly accepts Kalcion's offer, but… 

"Why in the world can't you do this!?"

 "Don't you think that the answer to that should be obvious to you, the actress, not to me, the duke?"

There was a critical problem. The Northern Duke's acting skills are horrible!

"…Let's change the plan. I'll seduce you instead."

And thus the contractual relationship between the two started. Will Kalcion's acting skill improve first, or will he start to have true feelings for Selena instead?

---
Rinha, Korea's most beloved actress, gets into an accident while on set. When she regains consciousness, she realizes she has traveled to the Kingdom of Iklein and meets the northern duke Calcion, who saves her from a demonic beast. Calcion asks her to be his fake lover so she can get into socialite and discover the conspiracy happening in his castle.

---

description.fr:
«Prétendre être mon amant et rejoindre le cercle social.»

Selena, la top star qui avait l'attention du monde entier, a soudainement atterrit dans le pays du Duc du Nord lors d'un accident de tournage. Kalcion, le duc du Nord qui l'a sauvée des bêtes infernales, offre à Selena une chance de rentrer chez elle en échange de la collecte d'informations dans divers cercles sociaux en prétendant être son amant. Selena accepte rapidement l'offre de Kalcion, mais...

«Pourquoi diable ne pouvez-vous pas pas faire ça?»

«Ne pensez-vous pas que la réponse à cette question devrait être évidente pour vous, l'actrice, et non pour moi, le duc?»

Il y avait un problème crucial. Les compétences d'acteur du Duc du Nord étaient horribles!

«...Changeons de plan. Je vais vous séduire à la place.»

Et c'est ainsi que la relation contractuelle entre les deux commença. Le talent d'acteur de Kalcion va-t-il s'améliorer en premier, ou va-t-il commencer à éprouver de vrais sentiments pour Selena?

---
Selena, une super star sous les feux de la rampe, se retrouve par accident sur les terres du Duc du Nord alors qu'elle était en plein tournage. Kalcion, le duc, la sauve des bêtes sauvages qui la menacent et lui offre une chance de retourner dans son monde. En échange, elle doit se faire passer pour sa petite amie et glaner des informations sur les réseaux sociaux. Selena accepte la proposition du duc, mais le Duc du Nord est un très mauvais acteur. Selena se met donc en tête de le séduire pour que la réalité rattrappe la fiction et que leur relation paraisse vraisemblable.

---

전 세계에서 주목하는 톱스타, 셀리나는

Все внимание мира было приковано к главной звезде, Селене, которая в результате катастрофы в процессе съемок случайно попала на территории Северного Герцога. Спасенная от зверей-демонов Кальционом, Северным Герцогом, она получает от него предложение предоставлять ему информацию из разных светских кругов в качестве его мнимой любовницы. В обмен он вернет ее домой. Недолго думая, Селена соглашается, но что ждет ее дальше…

description.uk:
Селена, головна зірка, яка привернула увагу всього світу, раптово потрапила на землю Північного Герцога потрапив у аварію під час зйомок. Кальціон, північний герцог, який врятував її від божевільних звірів, пропонує Селені шанс повернутися додому в обмін на збір інформації в різних соціальних колах, прикидаючись його коханою. Селена швидко приймає пропозицію Кальціона, але… «Чому ви самі не можете цього зробити!?» «Чи не здається вам, що відповідь на це має бути очевидною для вас, акторки, а не для мене, герцога?» Виникла критична проблема. Акторські здібності північного герцога жахливі! «…Давайте змінимо план. Натомість я спокушу вас». І таким чином між ними почалися договірні відносини. Чи покращиться акторська майстерність Кальціона, чи натомість він почне відчувати справжні почуття до Селени?

description.vi:
Seolena, nữ minh tinh xinh đẹp hàng đầu thế giới. Một ngày nọ, khi đang quay phim thì cô bất ngờ gặp tai nạn.
Khi mở mắt ra thì đã ở một thế giới khác và chạm mặt với công tước phương Bắc. Để có thể sống sót, Seolena đã ký hợp đồng với công tước Kalcion.
Kalcion sẽ giúp cô trở về thế giới của mình, còn cô sẽ đóng giả làm người yêu hắn, giúp hắn tìm ra mối đe doạ đằng sau mình.
Nhưng…diễn xuất của công tước thật tệ hại. Cô đành phải quyến rũ công tước vậy. Sau nhiều chuyện xảy ra, ánh mắt của công tước nhìn cô trở nên khác thường.
Phải chăng diễn xuất của công tước đã tiến bộ hay thật sự có cảm tình với cô rồi…?

掉入异世被迫假扮情侣，可公爵你的演技太差了吧！
在一次拍摄过程中，备受全球瞩目的巨星赛琳娜因突发事故穿越到了北部公爵的领地上。北部公爵卡西温将她从魔兽手中救了下来，并向她提出合约，要求她假装成自己的爱人，进入社交界获取情报……

description.pt-br:
“Finja ser minha amante e participe dos círculos sociais.”

Selena, uma estrela que atraiu a atenção do mundo todo, repentinamente foi parar nas terras do Duque do Norte após um acidente durante as filmagens. 

Kalcion, o Duque do Norte, que a salvou de bestas infernais, oferece a ela chance de voltar para casa em troca de coletar informações em vários círculos sociais, fingindo ser sua amante. 

Selena aceitou rapidamente a oferta de Kalcion, mas…

“Por que diabos você não consegue fazer isso?!”

“Não acha que a resposta deveria ser óbvia para você a atriz, e não para mim, o duque?”

Surgiu um problema crítico. 

As habilidades de atuação do duque são terríveis!

“… Vamos mudar o plano. Em vez disso, vou seduzi-lo.”

E assim, a relação contratual entre os dois começou.

A habilidade de atuação de Kalcion irá melhorar primeiro, ou ele começará a ter sentimentos verdadeiros por Selena?

---

description.en: Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

altTitles.ja: ジャイアントキリング

description.en:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.
description.pt-br: Giant Killing é um mangá que conta a história de um técnico de futebol, ex-jogador japonês, que luta para levar times amadores à vitória contra times campeões. Tatsumi Takeshi jogava profissionalmente no East Tokyo United, o ETU, e era louvado pelos torcedores por dar tudo de si e levar o time à vitória. Certo dia decide sair do Japão para treinar um time amador Europeu, e desde então é considerado “traidor” por alguns japoneses. Então, dois membros da equipe do ETU vão atrás do técnico para que ele treine o time onde um dia foi jogador, para tirar o time do fundo do poço.

altTitles.id: Tidak mudah membangun kerajaan perusahaan sebelum runtuh

description.en: In the tough times after the Japanese economic bubble burst, a career woman suffering through the aftermath reincarnates as Keikain Runa, the villainess of an otome game with a modern setting! However, not long after reincarnating, she realizes just how dire a situation her family is in due to the ongoing financial recession. Using knowledge from her previous life, Runa sets out to rescue her new family from crisis and stand against the tide of 'the times' that caused her past life to end in misery.
description.id:
Saya bereinkarnasi sebagai putri jahat dalam game otome berdasarkan dunia modern.

Tetapi karena ini adalah dunia modern, kehidupan lambat seorang penjahat memiliki banyak kesulitan, dan sejarah Jepang modern, sejarah ekonomi modern, dan ekonomi global menyerang karakter utama saat dia mencoba mengatur urusan rumah tangga.

Bertahanlah, penjahat! Jangan kalah, penjahat!

Ini adalah kisah tentang perjuangan Keikain Runa, seorang putri jahat yang melemparkan dirinya ke dalam pemalsuan sejarah dan perang uang, meninggalkan karakter utama dan target penangkapan untuk menjalani kehidupan yang lambat, dengan latar belakang Perang Dunia yang hilang , runtuhnya gelembung ekonomi, dan krisis keuangan yang mengancam.

Cerita pendek buatan anak bangsa

Bercerita tentang adik dan kakak? Yah baca aja lah! Semoga kalian suka!

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.
